original_title: La cosa que no podría morir
overview: A psychically gifted young woman discovers a centuries-old crate buried on her aunt's ranch. Upon opening it, they discover the living head of Gideon Drew, a 16th century devil worshiper who was be-headed by Sir Francis Drake. The head proceeds in controlling the minds of a big hulking goof and even the young woman's best friend in order to get back his body.
title: La cosa que no podría morir
